name: obsidian-ollama-chat
description: This is a Ollama Chat (https://ollama.ai) plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version-bump: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json && git commit -am 'bump version' && git tag -a $(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")

author: brumik
